current_role: Founder & Full Stack Developer at Hype Design
personal_brand_positioning: Premium web design founder helping entrepreneurs and SaaS businesses unlock growth with conversion-first landing pages.

backstory.origin: Started as a self-taught full-stack developer with a passion for solving problems through code.
backstory.journey: Built SaaS tools, automation frameworks, and high-converting landing pages. Founded Hype Design to help high-ticket founders and businesses escape low-converting, cookie-cutter websites.
milestones: Over 4 years of professional development experience
Founded Hype Design (2024) as a premium landing page agency
Experimenting with AI agents and conversion automation
lessons_learned: Cheap design is the most expensive mistake
Premium clients pay for ROI, not pixels
Scarcity and clarity in offers increase sales

content_pillars: Actionable tips for entrepreneurs and SaaS founders
audience_resonance: High-ticket coaches, SaaS founders, and ambitious entrepreneurs who want premium design that converts visitors into clients.
tone: Confident, authoritative, but still authentic and relatable.

content_preferences.storytelling_depth: Mix of punchy insights with occasional premium-level case breakdowns
topics_to_avoid: Overly technical posts without conversion context

goals_with_personal_brand: Position myself as the premium landing page specialist
Attract inbound leads for Hype Design
Build trust through teardowns, frameworks, and transparency
Grow authority in SaaS and high-ticket founder communities
